name: Between Vladimir Putin, Flower, & Vulture
description:
Nobody likes war and violence. This illustration work shows the figure of Vladimir Putin side by side with a flower and a vulture. The whole illustration is presented with a symbolic meaning parable. This illustration work is also inspired by one of Bad Religion's singles with titled: "Fuck Armageddon, This Is Hell!" which was released by Epitaph Records in 1982.

The basis for working on this illustration is using Chinese ink, Drawing Pen, & digital coloring.

14031 X 19866 PX

37.3 MB
